home.convertTitle: How to Convert Youtube to MP3 with Y2Mate?
home.convertStep1: Open Youtube and copy the video URL you want to download in MP3.
home.convertStep2: Paste the video URL in the Search box, Tool will fetch video info.
home.convertStep3: Select the Audio quality you need and click the "Convert" button.
home.convertStep4: After the conversion is successfully completed, click the "Download" button.
home.convertStep5: Once the Audio is downloaded, you can play it whenever and wherever you want.
